CmdLine: set -ex; 	apk add --no-cache --virtual .fetch-deps 		gnupg 		openssl 	; gpg_verify () { file=$1;url=$2;url_asc=$3;gpg_key=$4;wget -qO "$file" "$url";if [ "$url_asc" ]; then wget -qO "$file".asc "$url_asc";export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)";gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$gpg_key";gpg --batch --verify "$file".asc "$file";rm -rf "$GNUPGHOME" "$file".asc;fi;}; 	if $(gpg_verify elasticsearch.tar.gz "$ELASTICSEARCH_TARBALL" "$ELASTICSEARCH_TARBALL".asc $"ELASTICSEARCH_GPG_KEY"); then 		tar -xf elasticsearch.tar.gz --strip-components=1 && rm elasticsearch.tar.gz; 	fi; 	apk del .fetch-deps; addgroup -S elasticsearch && adduser -S -G elasticsearch elasticsearch ; 	chown -R elasticsearch:elasticsearch "$WORK"; wget -q https://github.com/muicoder/elk/raw/master/elasticsearch/entrypoint -O /sbin/entrypoint && chmod +x /sbin/entrypoint ; 	elasticsearch -V && true
Commands.Name: run
